wikipedia_page.main: Abi Eniola is a television actress. She has been acting since 1995. She is renowned for her roles in Grange Hill (2000), Little Britain (2003 / 2004), and The Bill (2008).

response: The principal actors were Jillie Meers as Dr Margaret Sampson, head of the health centre, Nigel Carrington as Dr David Boyce, and Abi Eniola as Dr Joy Onwukwe. It was created and edited by David Hitchinson.
